title: Mike Mulligan and his steam shovel [B&W]
creator_credit: Weston Woods Studios and Morton Schindel
brief_description: An iconographic film using the pictures and text of Virginia Lee Burton’s story of the steam shovel that defied obsolescence by becoming the furnace in the Popperville Town Hall. Suitable for lower and middle primary levels.
